about_the_game:
An enhanced building Tetris puzzle game. Render the scene using 3D. And better in HappyBlock than ever.
The game can exercise your responsiveness and bring you a pleasant experience.
Many beautiful scenes, multiple sound effects, colorful blocks. The blocks are successfully spliced and will be converted into gold coins. Happy big mouth will eat gold coins for you, so that your points increase.

How to play:
The color blocks falls from the top of the screen.
Move it to left or right,or rotate it,or adjust the array.
Take the same color block together.
If there are same color block more than 4 in horizontal
or vertical, they will change to gold coins.Your record
will increase.

Features:
Using the OpenGL render 3d game scene
The game has a total of 4 scenes.
The maximum level is 999.

Control:
-Menu key control
Up,down: change menu
Enter or space: executing menu

-Game key control
Left,right :move block to left or right
Down: block fast down
Up: chang array of block
Space: rotate block
Esc: back to main menu

Game Author:
Made by LydGameStudio
Progame by Chen Weihua
Art Design by Zhao XiaoXiao etc
